thread.section_title: Renaissance Beijing Wangfujing Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (China) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Wonderful Stay - Review
thread.title_full: Wonderful Stay - Review of Renaissance Beijing Wangfujing Hotel, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: Mark A
title: Wonderful Stay - Review
text: This hotel has it all. The staff is professional, helpful and mostly spoke English. The breakfasts on the 17 are great and offer a wonderful view of the city, including the Forbidden City. If I'm in Beijing again, I'd book this hotel. The shopping on Wangfujing is a short walk away.
